devdoc.author: GBaltazar
devdoc.details: Gas costs warning: functions may not execute if gas requirements are too high

MEWaddNewProduct(string,string,uint256).details: Owner can add MEW products to store to sell.

params.newProductDescription: The description of the new MEW product.
params.newProductName: is name of the new MEW product.
params.newProductPrice: The price of the new MEW product.

MEWpurchaseProduct(uint256,uint256).details: Purchase a MEW product from the store.

params.quantity: Units of MEW product inventory being purchased.

MEWtoggleContractActive().details: MEW Owner can change contract state in case of emergency.

MEWupdateInventoryCount(uint256,uint256).details: Owner can update MEW inventory for a given MEW product.

MEWwithdraw().details: MEW Owner can withdraw any funds the store has earned by selling products.

constructor.details: set sender as person who instantiated the MEW store contract

devdoc.title: A simulator Store to trade digital representations of Endangered Wildlife (MEW)

userdoc.notice: Very basic simulation; using SafeMath for uint256; product as MEWs
